data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zeidler, Wolfgang (2004): A review of the hyperiidean amphipod superfamily Lycaeopsoidea Bowman & Gruner, 1973 (Crustacea: Amphipoda: Hyperiidea). Zootaxa 520: 1-18, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157410
